entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
